text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria bimbiensis is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Cameroon.  Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Cheek, M. & Bridson, D. (2003). "Psychotria bimbiensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2003: e.T43887A10829313. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2003.RLTS.T43887A10829313.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
